sentences.english: The optical field and the atomic coupling coefficient do not affect an atomic dipole amplitude square squeezing.
sentences.chinese: 光場與原子的耦合係數不影響原子偶極振幅平方壓縮。

sentences.english: I have to ask is there a net dipole?
sentences.chinese: 我必須問這裏是否有一個網狀偶極？

sentences.english: Let's look at that one. Here we have a dipole.
sentences.chinese: 我們也標出了一個偶極。

sentences.english: This requires omni-directional or dipole loudspeakers that are free standing in the room.
sentences.chinese: 這需要全向或者偶極揚聲器自由的放置在房間中。

sentences.english: On the basis of the discussion, it has pointed that dipole secondary source-configuration (DAA) is the simplest attenuator.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上提出偶極次級源是較簡單的次級源結構。

sentences.english: It is shown that the introducing of the dipolar defects will decrease the coercive field.
sentences.chinese: 已證實引入偶極缺陷使矯頑場強下降。
